ios.name: spolujizda.online
ios.subtitle: Free community carpooling
ios.description:
Find and share rides with people going your way. spolujizda.online connects drivers with empty seats to passengers heading the same direction. Post a ride as a driver or search for one as a passenger — it's completely free.

Features:
- Post and search rides with smart route matching
- Real-time chat with your ride companions
- Live location sharing for easy pickup
- Events with dedicated ride listings
- Impact dashboard showing your CO2 savings
- Achievement badges and levels
- AI assistant for hands-free ride booking

Safe & Trustworthy:
- Verified profiles with phone and ID checks
- Ratings and reviews after every ride
- Driver reliability scores
- Report and block features

Available in Czech, Slovak, and English.

android.name: spolujizda.online
android.short_description: Free community carpooling — find and share rides
android.full_description:
Find and share rides with people going your way. spolujizda.online connects drivers with empty seats to passengers heading the same direction.

Whether you're commuting to work, heading to a festival, or traveling between cities, spolujizda.online makes it easy to find a ride or offer one.

Key Features:
★ Smart Search — Find rides near your route with geospatial matching
★ Post a Ride — Share your journey and split fuel costs
★ Real-time Chat — Coordinate with passengers and drivers
★ Live Location — Share your position for easy pickup
★ Events — Create events and find rides to them
★ Impact Dashboard — Track your CO2 savings
★ Badges & Levels — Earn achievements for sharing rides
★ AI Assistant — Book rides with natural language

Safety Features:
✓ Phone and ID verification
✓ Ratings and reviews
✓ Report and block users
✓ Driver reliability scores

Completely free. No commissions. No hidden fees.

Available in Czech, Slovak, and English.
